title: System Design Practical Skill Enhancement: Learning Analytics-Based Differentiation for Optimizing Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Perform learner profiling using learning analytics data and design personalized learning pathways
Establish data collection and analysis processes that comply with ethical guidelines

Learners can design a language education content recommendation system using Python and TensorFlow, which takes at least five learner characteristics (age, learning level, interests, etc.) as inputs, applies a collaborative filtering-based recommendation algorithm, and implements a prototype achieving over 80% recommendation accuracy.

Learners can design one project-based assessment tool in an online learning environment (LMS, GitHub Classroom, etc.), apply it to an actual software development project (e.g., a 3-person team collaboration project), and submit an evaluation report (including tool effectiveness, learner satisfaction, and areas for improvement).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
